name: BOYSEN®® Schoolboard Paint Green B‑655

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Schoolboard Paint Green is an alkyd-based paint that dries to a flat finish for classroom blackboards, bulletin boards, and other similar flat surfaces intended for chalk markings.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is ideal for wooden surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty. Sand rough wood until smooth and then dust off before painting.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Repainting
info.body: For repainting, scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint manually or by using BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141, as necessary. Wash surfaces clean and completely remove chemical residue. Let it dry. Prime with BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800 before recoating.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800 Putty: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311 Topcoat: BOYSEN®® Schoolboard Green B‑655
